title: Happy Ever After Endings
description: Following the events in Love for Sale, Matt is rushed to hospital critically injured.Doctors fight to save him, but are his injuries too severe for him to survive?Jack O’Malley is more determined than ever to conceal the truth, but Declan won’t rest until the secrets and lies have been exposed.With Jake unexpectedly on side, Declan makes a series of discoveries that shatter the foundations of his own existence.Who was Declan’s mother?What part did Jack play in her death?The stakes have never been higher, but who will get their Happy Ever After Ending?
author: Zane Michaelson
